resources.string: A Week of Healthy Meal Plans

One grapefruit Two poached eggs (or fried in a non-stick pan) Two slices whole-grain toast with one pat of butter each One cup low-fat milk One cup of black coffee or herbal tea Snack: One banana One cup plain yogurt with two tablespoons honey Glass of water
